about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate Full Stack Developer
about.description: With over 5 years of experience in web development, I create modern and performant digital experiences. Specialized in React, Node.js, and cloud architectures, I transform your ideas into robust and scalable web applications.

stayCourchevel.description: Participated in the development of the user interface and implementation of dynamic animations on a high-end showcase website. Careful integration work to ensure visual coherence and performance on all devices.

budjeoWeb.description: Complete design and development of the Budjeo application presentation website. Implementation of continuous and automated deployment via CI/CD pipelines to guarantee speed and reliability of updates.

budjeoApp.description: Complete development of an intuitive and performant mobile application for budget management. State management with Provider, data visualization with fl_chart, local storage and complete internationalization. Fluid and modern UI, optimized for iOS and Android.

pairleHypnose.description: Creation of a custom website for a beauty institute. Integration of custom themes, dynamic content management and SEO optimization.

terasolar.description: Responsive integration of the TeraSolar showcase website, with particular attention to information clarity and navigation fluidity on all devices.

amcreations.description: Development of a modern and interactive portfolio with clean design and fluid animations.
